maintainer.name: Gentoo network monitoring and analysis project

use.flag: Build the flow-tools to nfdump converter
Build nfudmp to support JunOS NAT event logging
Build nfpcapd collector to create netflow data from precollected pcap traffic
Build nfudmp to support NSEL/NEL event data
Build nfcapd collector to read from pcap file instead ofnetwork data

pkgmetadata.longdescription: nfdump is a toolset to collect and process netflow and sflow data, sent from netflow/sflow compatible devices. The toolset supports netflow v1, v5/v7,v9,IPFIX and SFLOW.
